>
[Duelist Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6313) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
<trait label="Dedication" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=572" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 197 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Duelist](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=248)

**Prerequisites**
trained in light armor and simple weapons

</column>

---

You are always ready to draw your weapon and begin a duel, no matter the circumstances. You gain the [Quick Draw](/Feats.aspx?ID=4869) feat, enabling you to both draw and attack with a weapon as 1 action.

<title level="2">Duelist Dedication leads to...</title>
[Duelist's Challenge](/Feats.aspx?ID=6314), [Selfless Parry](/Feats.aspx?ID=6315), [Student of the Dueling Arts](/Feats.aspx?ID=6316)
